title: Privacy
description: This site is hosted on GitHub Pages with a custom domain. It respects your privacy (no Google Analytics, no forms, no cookies, no tracking).

title: GDPR Compliance
description: This site does not use any invasive tracking cookies nor collect personal data during your visit thus not requiring consent for GDPR compliancy.
